export function helperPaginate(coins,currentPage,coinsPerPage){var pageNumbers=[];var totalPages=Math.ceil(coins.length/coinsPerPage);// Current Coin
var indexOfLastCoin=currentPage*coinsPerPage;var indexOfFirstCoin=indexOfLastCoin-coinsPerPage;var currentCoins=coins.slice(indexOfFirstCoin,indexOfLastCoin);for(var i=1;i<=totalPages;i++){pageNumbers.push(i);}return{currentCoins:currentCoins,pageNumbers:pageNumbers};};
